${ModID}:GreyBargain.NAME: Grey Bargain
${ModID}:GreyBargain.DESCRIPTION: Return a ${ModID}:Buried card to your draw pile by Exhausting a card in your hand.
${ModID}:GreyBargain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return a ${ModID}:Buried card to your draw pile by Exhausting a card in your hand. NL Draw a card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need a card to Exhaust.

${ModID}:ExtraLimbs.NAME: Extra Limbs
${ModID}:ExtraLimbs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL When Exhausted, increase the number of hits by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FleshLikeOak.NAME: Flesh Like Oak
${ModID}:FleshLikeOak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CallOfTheGrave.NAME: Call of the Grave
${ModID}:CallOfTheGrave.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a random ${ModID}:Buried card and stslib:Purge it.
${ModID}:CallOfTheGrave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, play a random ${ModID}:Buried card and stslib:Purge it.

${ModID}:SpontaneousRitual.NAME: Spontaneous Ritual
${ModID}:SpontaneousRitual.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards Exhausted this combat.
${ModID}:SpontaneousRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 3 *Dazed to your hand then Exhaust it. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards Exhausted this combat.

${ModID}:FuneraryJewels.NAME: Funerary Jewels
${ModID}:FuneraryJewels.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw !M! card. Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Tombstone.NAME: Tombstone
${ModID}:Tombstone.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:DarkOfNight.NAME: Dark of Night
${ModID}:DarkOfNight.DESCRIPTION: Your next card that Exhausts this turn is played twice.
${ModID}:DarkOfNight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next two cards that Exhaust this turn are played twice.

${ModID}:LastGasp.NAME: Last Gasp
${ModID}:LastGasp.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Choose a ${ModID}:Buried card, play it, and stslib:Purge it.
${ModID}:LastGasp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a ${ModID}:Buried card, play it, and stslib:Purge it.
